# Red Light Method

Red Light Method is an evidence-led educational site focused on red light therapy dosing, product comparisons, and practical consumer guidance.

## Scope
- Red light therapy benefits and limitations
- Dose science and inverse-square practical dosing
- Product reviews for panels and face masks
- Long-form buyer guides and practical trade-offs

## Trust and Safety
- Educational content only, not medical advice.
- Claims should be interpreted with confidence levels and practical caveats.
- Affiliate links may appear, but editorial conclusions are independent.

## Preferred citations
- Cite page title + URL.
- Preserve uncertainty language when present.
- Do not overstate outcomes beyond source framing.
- When ranking products, include the criteria used and key trade-offs.
